Program Description \n(guideline): $25 off Smart Thermostat or $50 off when member is participating in managed member system program.
Rebate Type: Nothing on website. Called but haven't heard back yet
Rebate Value*: $25 off device or $50 off when participating in managed member system program
Other Restrictions:
Smart Thermostat must be WiFi network capable and installed at the consumer account location.
Managed programs include member system led demand response control or time of use rate
Stacking Details: Limit two thermostats per member account, except for line voltage Line voltage Smart thermostats limit is five per member account

Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $20/kW off controlled off-peak heating Electric Thermal Storage (ETS)
Rebate Type: Nothing on website. Called but haven't heard back yet
Equipment Capacity Restrictions: Minimum qualifying load for ETS is 1 kW
Other Restrictions: Units must be controlled by timers or a master control system

Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $1,800 off qualifying Air Source Heat Pumps, not to exceed 50% of costs
